pullrequest.title: Model becoming transparent while being manipulated.

content.raw:
I couldn't reproduce the light problem.

Yes the behavior isn't exactly like gazebo, I was trying to compromise between gazebo's behavior and not messing the code much, I recall that the transparency while manipulating indicated that the physics is not being applied right now, so I guess the meaning is still not lost.

So if you still think it is better to have the same exact gazebo's behavior, it wouldn't be much of a problem to update the PR.
